body_content.explanation: a hair that has divided into several parts at its end:
examples: Dry, brittle hair and split ends were the unfortunate consequence of years of dyeing it peroxide blond.

body_content.explanation: an attacking position in American football at the end of the line of linemen, or a person playing in this position:
examples: The switch in systems also means he will be moving from split end, the position he played in former coach Dan Reeves' offense, to flanker.
Split end Mike Stuntz caught a 63-yard touchdown pass in Nebraska's 20-10 victory.
